Direct Known Subclasses:
FileIPRange
public abstract class IPRange
extends AbstractGroupable

A range of IP addresses, expressed by a network address and a subnet mask.

Version:
$Id: IPRange.html,v 1.1 2003/10/17 20:04:33 michi Exp $
Author:
Andreas Hartmann, Michael Wechner
